name: mute
description: Mute a user in the server.
code:
$suppressErrors
$deletecommand
$if[$isBot[$mentioned[1]]==true;{delete:1}{description:You cannot mute a bot!}{color:RED}]
$if[$isUser [$mentioned[1]]==false;{delete:1}{description:User  not found!}{color:RED}]
$mute[$mentioned[1];$noMentionMessage]
$embed[{title:User  Muted}{description:$username[$mentioned[1]] has been muted!}{color:RED}]
